item.description:
NOTE: Because of space limitations at Dirigo Design & Development the location for this Thursday's meeting has been changed to 15 Franklin Arterial in Portland.  We'll be able to accommodate more people, and it's great to see lots of rsvps.  

The name of the company is 4 Tell Solutions at 15 Franklin Arterial just a few blocks DownEast of Dirigo.

 - - - - - - - - - - -

Let's continue our conversation among developers and others involved or just interested in publishing for iOS.  

We've had a number of new people join the group since our last meeting and everyone's welcome to come and introduce yourself and your work, or what you need to make life easier. Take a few minutes or make a longer presentation to bounce ideas off our intrepid team of Young Imagineers -- FREE of charge. Maybe we can help. We're looking forward to meeting you.  

If we're lucky: local hero Kerry Gallivan will come again and allow us to live vicariously through his success with Chimani now with 5 national park apps for iPhone and Android!? @?#$%!

Or if there's something else anyone would like to present, pitch, or see presented, please suggest to me via email or post to this group. 

As if all that isn't enough: Raphael has confirmed: there will be pizza. 


I hope you can make it,

Brian
item.why: Let's meet on 2nd Thursday again. This time at 15 Franklin Arterial in Portland. We'll have a review and discussion of the Boston iOS conference, swag galore, and so much more.
item.name: iOS Dev. Networking & Discussion
